pages.text: $(li)The Red Spotted Taiga is variant of the Taiga biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Dandelions, Violets, Taiga and Maple trees.$(br)$(li)Foxes likes to walk around this place too.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Red Spotted Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
